languages.text: {n}Комиссар криво ухмыляется.{/n} "А вот это зря. Голосить я тоже умею. Посмотрим, кого они послушают?"
{n}The Commissar smirks.{/n} "Oh, you really shouldn't have. I can shout things too, you see. I wonder who they'll listen to."
languages.original_text: {n}Комиссар криво ухмыляется.{/n} "А вот это зря. Голосить я тоже умею. Посмотрим, кого они послушают?"

languages.text: {n}政委笑了起来。{/n}“噢，你可真不该这么做。如你所见，我也一样会喊话。不知那些人会听谁的呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar smirks.{/n} "Oh, you really shouldn't have. I can shout things too, you see. I wonder who they'll listen to."

traits.locale_text: {n}政委笑了起来。{/n}“噢，你可真不该这么做。如你所见，我也一样会喊话。不知那些人会听谁的呢？”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}コミッサーはにやりと笑った。{/n}「何を言うかと思えば。私だって大声で叫べますよ。果たして彼らはどちらの言うことを聞きますかね？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar smirks.{/n} "Oh, you really shouldn't have. I can shout things too, you see. I wonder who they'll listen to."

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーはにやりと笑った。{/n}「何を言うかと思えば。私だって大声で叫べますよ。果たして彼らはどちらの言うことを聞きますかね？」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}El Comisario sonríe.{/n} «Oh, no tenías por qué hacerlo. Yo también puedo gritar cosas, ¿sabe? Me pregunto a quién creerán».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar smirks.{/n} "Oh, you really shouldn't have. I can shout things too, you see. I wonder who they'll listen to."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario sonríe.{/n} «Oh, no tenías por qué hacerlo. Yo también puedo gritar cosas, ¿sabe? Me pregunto a quién creerán».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar smirks.{/n} "Oh, you really shouldn't have. I can shout things too, you see. I wonder who they'll listen to."

languages.text: {n}Un rictus vient déformer les traits du commissaire.{/n} « Oh, vous n'auriez pas dû faire ça. Moi aussi, je sais crier, vous savez. Je me demande qui ils vont écouter. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar smirks.{/n} "Oh, you really shouldn't have. I can shout things too, you see. I wonder who they'll listen to."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rictus vient déformer les traits du commissaire.{/n} « Oh, vous n'auriez pas dû faire ça. Moi aussi, je sais crier, vous savez. Je me demande qui ils vont écouter. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar grinst.{/n} "Oh, das hättet Ihr wirklich nicht tun sollen. Ich kann auch Sachen rufen, wisst Ihr. Fragt sich, auf wen sie wohl eher hören."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar smirks.{/n} "Oh, you really shouldn't have. I can shout things too, you see. I wonder who they'll listen to."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar grinst.{/n} "Oh, das hättet Ihr wirklich nicht tun sollen. Ich kann auch Sachen rufen, wisst Ihr. Fragt sich, auf wen sie wohl eher hören."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser sırıtıyor.{/n} "Çok yanlış yapıyorsun. Bağırmasını ben de bilirim hani. Bakalım hangimizi dinleyecekler..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar smirks.{/n} "Oh, you really shouldn't have. I can shout things too, you see. I wonder who they'll listen to."

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser sırıtıyor.{/n} "Ah, bunu yapmamalıydın bak. Bağırmasını ben de bilirim hani. Bakalım kimi dinleyecekler."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
